nodes.text: The Kirmay clan was a group of individuals who owned a farm near the city of Imbraani on the Mid Rim planet Qiilura by 22 BBY. The clan lost the property when Ghez Hokan, a Mandalorian serving in the Confederacy of Independent Systems, sold the group to Trandoshan slavers. The farm was later repurposed as a staging area for fifty to sixty of Hokan's mercenaries, as estimated by a Qiiluran villager.
The Kirmay clan was mentioned in the 2004 novel Republic Commando: Hard Contact, written by Karen Traviss.
